# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a player object.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated init()
```

## Creating a player

- **init(url:)**: Creates a new player to play a single audiovisual resource referenced by a given URL.
- **init(playerItem:)**: Creates a new player to play the specified player item.

items.description: Creates a new player to play a single audiovisual resource referenced by a given URL.
items.name: init(url:)

items.description: Creates a new player to play the specified player item.
